replies.body: The promotion and relegation is a great idea and it will be awesome to see broadcasts of our up and coming pro talents!{{item:3060}}
is all the teams already been selected? or can we still try to enter the open ladder?
Yeah, you'll be able to enter the Open Ladder. It doesn't start until after the OCS starts, so not until mid-February. Full details haven't been released yet.
all this looks great but any chance the website will update with results as soon as it happens or will we have to wait days as per last split
Is there a way we can see the current OCS teams seeing as the oce lolesports website isn't updated?
At this point in time, we haven't finalised the OCS Split 1 participants, so you can't see them just yet. Sorry for the inconvenience.
How are you determining which of those teams qualify? are u including wildcard teams or just those that participated in the relegation matches?
can you enter the OOL in more than one team?
Players can be a member of only one roster.
With the way OCS works now does this mean teams from open ladder have to spend 2 splits making OPL now?

The Promotion Tournament from OOL into OCS occurs at the end of every split; following split 1, the top teams from OOL will play off against the teams at the bottom of the OCS ladder for a spot in split 2 of the 2016 OCS.
how do you figure out who's in the first OCS split?
We have invited the teams that participated in the previous OCS to join split 1 of the 2016 OCS.
Looks like a lot of nerds will be heading to Brisbane in August. Neat!
Another question. Is any of the games being held in Sydney. If so which one? TY
{{summoner:31}} was just wondering when we'll be able to purchase the tickets to hoyts opl? and also would their be showbags like last year?
Im aware tickets will be a while off, but is it known how much a ticket will cost or what the limited number of tickets is going to be ????
Someone please reply if possible: When do tickets go on sale for the OPL finals? want to get decent seats.
By the sounds, not for a while. Riot said they will annouce it however.
Will the OPL come to Brisbane and if not where are the games held {{champion:26}}
how do you figure out who's in the first OCS split?
We've invited the teams that participated in the previous OCS split to join Split 1 in 2016.
Any games in Sydney?

The link from the client (http://oce.lolesports.com/content/2016-opl-season-coming) directs you to a different version of this page where the log in to comment button doesn't work,   Will the new lobby be running before the new season starts ? in normals if not in ranked ?

Hey dude, the login to comment button seems to work fine for me. If you're wondering why there are two versions of the page, we initially constructed it for oce.leagueoflegends.com before porting it to oce.lolesports.com. Esports stuff fits better on the esports site, wouldn't you agree? :P
"http://oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/page/announcing-2016-opl-season" being this page

This format screws every current OOL teams when half the teams you probably invited aren't even worthy of a OCS spot. Why not have a mini tournament to properly determine which team is worthy.

Giving free OCS like Oprah
Do we have 2 be lv 30 2 participate? Thanks!
